Medford.Craterian Theater:
The Craterian Theater at The Collier Center for the Performing Art is a state-of-the-art performing arts center located in Medford, Oregon.
While the theater has a seating capacity of 732, the theater will frequently hold large, national concerts, dance, and theatrical tours. The Craterian Theater facility is also used for community performances, rehearsals, classes, conferences, receptions, and more.
